ygData.subject: Re: spell changes
ygData.msgSnippet: At 06:26 PM 05/25/1999 -0500, Ann Scanlan  ... It s a shame you aren t on Fennin Ro.  I like to group with people who keep these
ygData.messageBody:
At 06:26 PM 05/25/1999 -0500, Ann Scanlan <scan@...>
wrote:
>Ever been in a group that wanted to go into an area that was too high
>level? How about a group that where there is no real leader and people
>attack things wily-nily, thinking that someone is covering their backs,
>only to find out that there are now 6 yellow monsters for a 4 person
>group?

It's a shame you aren't on Fennin Ro. I like to group with people who keep
these things in mind.

I don't recommend soloing, not Crushbone at least. Orcs spawn too often
and too close together there - and they have a nasty habit of running away
and returning with reinforcements. I've had a lot of luck with a three
person crew there - a wiz (me), a druid, and a paladin. The classes though
don't matter nearly as much as the people playing them though. If you're
with a group that has the same concerns in mind that you do, you'll do fine
- but if it's like trying to herd cats, you're with the wrong people and
they'll probably get you killed.

Send me a tell if you ever come over to Fennin Ro.

Pennaggolan, 3rd Circle Wizard of Felwithe
Famous last words: "Hail, D'Vinn."
